column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Very Knowledgable staff
column3: it was the first time to a ramen bar
column4: and definitely found the right veggie dish for me
column6: with tofu and no pork! They don't have rice noodles
column8: and most things on the help menu
column11: which is unfortunate but in Vegas and Florida they are.... Will have to make a trip for that or wait for it to be available in Houston.
